channel.title: General Game Discussion and Review Thread!
channel.description:
I'm pretty sure we don't have the game-centric equivalent of the Unofficial Official Chat Thread yet, so here, let's make one. I'll start things off with a question:
Anyone here played Catherine? Like it? Didn't like it? Why? And is it worth $20 + shipping?

item.title: General Game Discussion and Review Thread!
item.dc:creator: Orpheon
item.description:
Hmm, there are a couple of threads similar to this, but whatever, I’m down.

I’m wondering the same thing about Transistor. I really liked Bastion and Transistor looks interesting, but I’m wondering if it’s worth the $20 or if I should wait for a sale.

Read full topic
item.source: General Game Discussion and Review Thread!
